languages.text: "А ну постой". {n}Голос Каллигоса похож на рык голодного зверя.{/n} "Получается, ты пойдешь сворачивать голову Калькасару, а я буду сидеть здесь?! Нет уж, я иду с тобой и лично выпотрошу этого ублюдка!"

traits.locale_text: "А ну постой". {n}Голос Каллигоса похож на рык голодного зверя.{/n} "Получается, ты пойдешь сворачивать голову Калькасару, а я буду сидеть здесь?! Нет уж, я иду с тобой и лично выпотрошу этого ублюдка!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
languages.original_text: "А ну постой". {n}Голос Каллигоса похож на рык голодного зверя.{/n} "Получается, ты пойдешь сворачивать голову Калькасару, а я буду сидеть здесь?! Нет уж, я иду с тобой и лично выпотрошу этого ублюдка!"

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice is like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean you're off to twist Calcazar's neck and I'm going to be stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice is like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean you're off to twist Calcazar's neck and I'm going to be stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I get stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Un momento». {n}La voz de Calligos es gutural, como el gruñido de una bestia hambrienta.{/n} «¿Quiere decir que va a partirle el cuello a Calcazar mientras yo me pudro aquí? Olvídelo. ¡Me voy con usted para destripar yo mismo a ese bastardo!».
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: «Un momento». {n}La voz de Calligos es gutural, como el gruñido de una bestia hambrienta.{/n} «¿Quiere decir que va a partirle el cuello a Calcazar mientras yo me pudro aquí? Olvídelo. ¡Me voy con usted para destripar yo mismo a ese bastardo!».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “等等。”{n}卡里戈斯的声音宛如饥饿野兽的咆哮。{/n}“你的意思是说，你要去拧断卡尔卡扎的脖子，而我得留在这里？没门！我要和你一起去，亲手把那个混蛋开膛破肚！”
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: “等等。”{n}卡里戈斯的声音宛如饥饿野兽的咆哮。{/n}“你的意思是说，你要去拧断卡尔卡扎的脖子，而我得留在这里？没门！我要和你一起去，亲手把那个混蛋开膛破肚！”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Un instant. » {n}La voix de Calligos résonne comme le grondement d'une bête affamée.{/n} « Vous voulez dire que vous allez tordre le cou de Calcazar pendant que moi, je reste coincé ici ? Certainement pas. Je vous accompagne et j'étriperai ce fumier moi-même ! »
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: « Un instant. » {n}La voix de Calligos résonne comme le grondement d'une bête affamée.{/n} « Vous voulez dire que vous allez tordre le cou de Calcazar pendant que moi, je reste coincé ici ? Certainement pas. Je vous accompagne et j'étriperai ce fumier moi-même ! »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「待て」{n} カリゴスの声は飢えた獣のうなり声のように聞こえた。{/n}「俺がここで動けない間に、カルカサルの首をへし折りに行くというのか？忘れてくれ。俺はあのクソ野郎をぶちのめしてやるためにお前と一緒に来たんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: 「待て」{n} カリゴスの声は飢えた獣のうなり声のように聞こえた。{/n}「俺がここで動けない間に、カルカサルの首をへし折りに行くというのか？忘れてくれ。俺はあのクソ野郎をぶちのめしてやるためにお前と一緒に来たんだ！」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Augenblick." {n}Calligos' Stimme groll wie das Knurren einer hungrigen Bestie.{/n} "Wollt Ihr etwa sagen, Ihr zieht los, um Calcazar den Hals umzudrehen, während ich hier festsitze? Vergesst es. Ich komme mit Euch und weide den Mistkerl persönlich aus!"
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Augenblick." {n}Calligos' Stimme groll wie das Knurren einer hungrigen Bestie.{/n} "Wollt Ihr etwa sagen, Ihr zieht los, um Calcazar den Hals umzudrehen, während ich hier festsitze? Vergesst es. Ich komme mit Euch und weide den Mistkerl persönlich aus!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Bir dakika." {n}Calligos, aç bir canavarın mide gurultusunu andıran bir uğuldama çıkarıp konuşuyor.{/n} "Ben buraya tıkılıp kalmışken sen Calcazar'ın boynunu mu kıracaksın? Yok öyle. Seninle gelip o şerefsizin bağırsaklarını kendi ellerimle dökeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Hold on." {n}Calligos's voice thrums like the growl of a hungry beast.{/n} "You mean to say you're off to snap Calcazar's neck while I'm stuck here? Forget it. I'm coming with you to gut that bastard myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir dakika." {n}Calligos'un sesi, aç bir canavarın mide gurultusu gibi uğulduyor.{/n} "Ben buraya tıkılıp kalmışken sen Calcazar'ın boynunu mu keseceksin? Yok öyle. O şerefsizin bağırsaklarını kendi ellerimle yere dökmek için seninle geleceğim!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
